name: CaisterSoulRadio
0:
”Alexa, Play Caister Soul Radio”
”Alexa, Open Caister Soul Radio”
”Alexa, Launch Caister Soul Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: caister soul radio
des: Welcome to Caister Soul Radio, the ultimate destination for reliving the memories of the longest-running and unquestionably the best ever Soul Weekender. At Caister Soul Radio, we bring you a curated selection of soul music that will transport you back to those unforgettable weekends filled with pure soulful bliss. Here, we celebrate the essence of soul, keeping the spirit alive with every note and rhythm. Join us as we embark on a journey fueled by the timeless melodies, powerful vocals, and infectious grooves that defined our era. Our playlist is dedicated to the heart and soul of music, focusing solely on soul classics that will touch your emotions and ignite your passion. No house, no garage — just a caravan and an abundance of soulful tunes that will stir your soul. So tune in, turn up the volume, and let Caister Soul Radio be your sanctuary of musical nostalgia, where the memories live on and the soulful vibes never fade away.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
